name: SuperX
tagline: All-in-one growth OS for serious ùïè creators
description: SuperX is an all-in-one growth toolkit for ùïè. Get daily inspiration based on viral posts in your niche, trend-based research, and fast rewrites in your voice. Schedule posts at the best time, engage with the right accounts to get discovered, and track what works with built-in analytics.

name: Unicorne
tagline: The 20 fastest growing startups based on TrustMRR data
description: Watch the top 20 fastest growing tech startups in real-time. Rankings updated hourly with verified revenue data from Stripe, Paddle, and RevenueCat.

name: Umbrel Pro
tagline: 16TB home cloud server. Run OpenClaw, store files, and more.
description: Home cloud server with 4 NVMe SSD slots for up to 16TB storage. Milled from a single block of aluminum and framed with American Walnut. Powered by umbrelOS - run OpenClaw, Immich (photo/video backups), and hundreds of self-hosted apps with one click.

name: rivva
tagline: AI schedule & planner based around your energy
description: rivva is an AI task manager and calendar planner that organises your day around how well you can actually think and work, so demanding tasks land when your focus is strongest. Most productivity tools only model activity; they track tasks and meetings, but ignore the limits of human attention. rivva works from a fuller picture by combining what you need to do with how much capacity you have to do it, using your tasks and calendar alongside signals from sleep, energy patterns, and cognitive load.

name: DubStream by CAMB.AI
tagline: Dub live streams in 150+ languages, instantly
description: Broadcast your live stream in 150+ languages with real-time voice dubbing. DubStream is trusted by global leaders like MLS and NASCAR. Available via web platform or API. Built on CAMB.AI‚Äôs MARS8 voice AI.

name: Dropstone 3
tagline: The first multiplayer AI code editor. Now with Share Chat.
description: Dropstone is the first multiplayer AI workspace. v3.0.5 adds Share Chat: send a link to code with humans & agents in real-time. Features infinite context (D3 Engine), persistent memory & background swarms. Built on original research, not a wrapper.

name: ClawdTalk
tagline: Your Clawdbot's first phone number.
description: It's time to talk to your Clawdbot. ClawdTalk gives your agent a phone number so you can call, text or WhatsApp it from anywhere in the world. ClawdTalk is voice-first, so you can have actual conversations instead of being confined to chat windows. It's secure by design, your agent can only call and text you, and it's easy to set up, just add your phone number and start talking. Start free with 10 minutes of voice and 10 messages per day. Your Clawdbot, reachable anywhere. Powered by Telnyx.

name: OpenAI Frontier
tagline: Operate AI coworkers on a single enterprise platform
description: A new platform that helps enterprises build, deploy, and manage AI agents that can do real work. Frontier gives agents the same skills people need to succeed at work: shared context, onboarding, hands-on learning with feedback, and clear permissions and boundaries. That‚Äôs how teams move beyond isolated use cases to AI coworkers that work across the business.

name: CRML
tagline: CRML is a declaritive language for writing cyberrisk as code
description: We have infrastructure as a code, network as a code but dont have anything as Risk As a Code. CRML is an open, declarative, engine-agnostic and Control / Attack framework‚Äìagnostic Cyber Risk Modeling Language. It provides a YAML/JSON format for describing cyber risk models, telemetry mappings, simulation pipelines, dependencies, and output requirements ‚Äî without forcing you into a specific quantification method, simulation engine, or security-control / threat catalog.

name: Apple Creator Studio
tagline: Powerful creativity apps and premium productivity features
description: The apps you need for everything you want to create. Craft your stories with video in Final Cut Pro. Reimagine images in Pixelmator Pro. Produce your best music in Logic Pro. Supercharge productivity with premium content in Keynote, Pages, Numbers, and Freeform Boost workflows with AI features that build on Apple Intelligence. And with Family Sharing, up to five other people can enjoy your subscription too.

name: Agent Credit
tagline: The first credit line for agents
description: The first credit line for agents. Let your agent borrow & repay credit, using Aave. - aaronjmars/agent-credit

name: Bezel
tagline: Wirelessly Mirror any iPhone on your Mac
description: The best way to display and record any iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV now supporting wireless mirroring using AirPlay.

name: Afterpage
tagline: Smart document organization with AI that learns
description: Afterpage is a smart document organizer that transforms chaos into a searchable archive. Import from anywhere, then let Smart Organization learn your patterns and suggest where documents belong. Everything runs on your device and stores in your iCloud Drive.

name: Voyager
tagline: Find files by rules, not by folders ‚ú¥Ô∏è
description: ‚ú¥Ô∏è Voyager is a macOS file manager beyond Finder. It‚Äôs built for language-driven file management. Describe what you need in plain language, and Voyager cuts the busywork of staying organized as your files pile up.

name: CrewClaw
tagline: Build AI Agents. Run Them Anywhere.
description: Generate the foundation for your AI agents. Identity, memory, scheduling, tools, team structure. 9 config files ready to deploy. Build a single agent or a team of 3-5 that work together. Run on a Mac Mini, VPS, or your laptop.

name: GitUX
tagline: A GitKraken alternative minus the subscription fee
description: Gitux Visual Git Made Simple A lightweight Git client. Beautiful commit graphs, intuitive staging, voice-powered commits, and keyboard shortcuts that make you fly. Try free for 4 weeks; no credit card, no account required.

name: Focus Ticker
tagline: Treat your focus sessions as startup.
description: Focus Ticker turns your productivity into a high-stakes stock market. You found one in-game startup, and every focus session grows your lifetime valuation. But there's a catch: if you leave the app and don't come back, your stock crashes instantly. Includes strict App Blocking to stop doomscrolling, Live Widgets to track your empire, and Bot Leaderboards to compete against. Built for students, workers and ADHD brains who find normal timers boring.

name: ClawSec by Prompt Security
tagline: A Security Skill Suite for OpenClaw Agents
description: Human-proof your AI agents with this security skill suite. ClawSec is an open-source security skill suite created to harden OpenClaw agents against prompt injection, supply chain compromise, configuration drift, and unsafe runtime behavior. Purpose-built as a ‚Äúskill-of-skills‚Äù, ClawSec wraps agents in a continuously verified security layer, validating what it runs, how it changes, and where the data is allowed to go.

name: MOLT ‚Äî Cloud Platform for OpenClaw
tagline: Deploy secure OpenClaw agents in 3 minutes. No Docker.
description: Don't risk your local machine. Deploy autonomous agents 24/7 in Molt's sandboxed cloud environment. Safe, managed hosting for OpenClaw.

name: LifeSwap
tagline: AI wellbeing companion for overloaded minds
description: LifeSwap is an AI-powered wellbeing companion for overloaded minds. Talk to a 24/7 AI listener, try 3‚Äëminute resets (breathing, micro-meditations, focus tools), and track your mood over time. For everyday stress and burnout, not a medical device.
